definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: One such surface is known as the pseudosphere.
sentences.chinese: 一個這樣的曲面名爲僞球面。

sentences.english: Wilson holds a patent on this "Aspherical Propagation Delay" technique.
sentences.chinese: 威爾遜擁有專利的“非球面傳輸時延”技術。

sentences.english: I can always find a portion of the sphere that's bounded by it.
sentences.chinese: 總是可以找到球面的一部分以它爲界。

sentences.english: The error estimates for scattered data interpolants on spheres are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論球面上散佈數據點插值的誤差估計問題。

sentences.english: The load-carrying capacity of spherical roller bearings is high.
sentences.chinese: 承載能力，球面滾子軸承高。

sentences.english: So we propose that the focused spherical wave should be used as the reference wave in shiftmultiplexed holographic Thee. The e…
sentences.chinese: 因此提出在移位存儲中宜採用會聚球面波作爲參考波。

sentences.english: This technique suits to schlieren system which schlieren mirrors arespherical especially.
sentences.chinese: 此技術特別適用於紋影鏡爲球面反射鏡的紋影系統。

sentences.english: A new method of surface shape measurement of aspherical optical components.
sentences.chinese: 一種測量非球面光學零件面形的新方法。

sentences.english: That will simplify to a because we are on the sphere.
sentences.chinese: 它們最終會簡化成a，因爲向量的終點都在球面上。

sentences.english: E-field distribution are similar on spheres at different radius. (4).
sentences.chinese: 電流陣列在不同半徑場球面上之電場分佈相同。

sentences.english: Here it is more like we are parameterizing the sphere.
sentences.chinese: 這兒我們只是把球面參數化了。

sentences.english: Aspheric optical part processing is an acknowledged difficult problem around the world.
sentences.chinese: 非球面光學零件加工是國內外公認的難題。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the focusing principle of spherical heliostat.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了球面定日鏡的聚光原理。

sentences.english: Long durability thanks to washing and corrosion resistant alloy sphere valve core and stainless valve seat.
sentences.chinese: 合金球面閥芯與不鏽鋼閥座耐沖蝕，使用壽命長。

sentences.english: It depends on the diameter and the aspherical departure of the lens.
sentences.chinese: 它取決於直徑和透鏡的非球面的離開。

sentences.english: Object - image distance formula of single spherical surface is derived through Times Compensation.
sentences.chinese: 用時間補償法推導了單一球面的物像距公式。

definition: to rotate about an axis/axis of rotation (math.)
